website_summaries.verdict: Bells and whistles galore mean not just beer can chicken: the set also cooks tasty appetizers, vegetables, and other roasted meats.
pros: Durable stainless steel is easy to cook on, clean, and break down for storage
Can be used in the oven and on the grill
Sliding tray allows for beer, wine, marinade, or wood chips
Users love the many functions it has, from grilling fish to roasting chicken
cons: Holes on the underside of the rack are a bit on the sharp side, so users should handle with care

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Smokerer (...someone who uses a Smoker)
customer_reviews.text: Gift for Brother- he Loved it, is SUPER Excited to use it- went out to make make room for it in the smoker 10 min after opening it, planning on using it for New Years Dinner. The Chicken/ turkey he plans on Smoking might not be as stoked but rather...wait for it.....Smoked. Ahh, I kill me!
customer_reviews.author: The Jib

customer_reviews.title: It didn't call over and the bird cooked beautifully. Cleaning was ok because I used Comet
customer_reviews.text: We used it yesterday, with a 13lb turkey. Used the beer can feature. Because of the weight of the turkey, we kept the whole thing together for support. Overkill, but it worked! It didn't call over and the bird cooked beautifully. Cleaning was ok because I used Comet! Glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Owen Yoder

customer_reviews.title: I like being able to grill my veggies in the tray
customer_reviews.text: It was just as advertised and more. I like being able to grill my veggies in the tray. I would absolutely buy this as a gift for someone else. Love Love Love
customer_reviews.author: Denise Ray

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, useful design...
customer_reviews.text: received this as a gift from my wife. We BBQ probably 3 days a week during spring/summer/winter, using an offset wood burner. I'm not a big fan of BBQ items, but this is truly a good addition. Only 4 skewers, but that's not a big deal. It sure seems to be a decent quality item. We used the "beer can" with a 5# chicken, kept it on the box. Great results. Super stable. Smoker box should work well, too. All in all, I'd recommend it to another BBQ guy.
customer_reviews.author: just a guy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Must Have for the Grilling King in your Life😉
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my hubby and he was thrilled. It’s exactly what he wanted and he couldn’t wait to use it. Needless to say, he planned a big cookout to show off his new grilling toy. It was a big success.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: It’s for my husband for Christmas but I had to take it out of the package to check it out.....it’s definitely high quality heavy duty metal that will last! Can’t wait to roast some of my jalepenos from my garden next summer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Showed up broken
customer_reviews.text: The metal can on top came broken and the top is scuffed up.. so sad! I was looking forward to this! :(
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Multi Use Cooking Unit
customer_reviews.text: Dear Jim, I have already written a review regarding the 5 in 1,however, I will do another one. The unit is perfect, it's heavy duty, easy to use, and the right size for all the veggies. the delivery was quick, the unit was well packed and not damaged (like so many are). It got here in record time-prior to stated delivery. My wife couldn't be happier with the unit and I get to use it too. Excellent cooking device.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ Combination Equipment at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased by my wife; she loves the combination. So far we used the beer can chicken portion and it works great. Super moist and tender roasted chicken! Great price, shipped on time and received in perfect condition as expected.
customer_reviews.author: acturage

customer_reviews.title: Great product AND customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I bought this for my husband for a gift. He loves it and has used it a few times already in the last week. It's very easy to clean and so easy to store. The customer service at BBQ Aid is amazing too! I emailed them a question and they responded within 2 minutes! Wow! Definitely will spread the word about what a great company this is with great products! Made in the USA!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie A

customer_reviews.title: Messy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this more than I do. I just don't. The biggest problem with it is it is too messy to clean and it doesn't have a solid bottom so the grease goes everywhere when I bring it in to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: RLCBNHH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome BBQ gear!!
customer_reviews.text: Giving this to my husband for Christmas. It arrived quickly and looks like it’s going to be AWESOME!!!! Can’t wait for him to fire up the grill!
customer_reviews.author: Carson's Mom

customer_reviews.title: If you BBQ you need this !!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this awesome product and use it all the time it’s well made and works great. I’ve used this so many times and so many ways on my BlackStone grill. Love this. 👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: MCGHOSTONE

customer_reviews.title: His whole family raved at how good it was
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a Christmas gift to my son-in-law the grill master. He used it immediately to cook the beer chicken. His whole family raved at how good it was. Easy to use and sturdy. Keep it up.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Jolicoeur

customer_reviews.title: These items were a gift and the recipient continues to ...
customer_reviews.text: These items were a gift and the recipient continues to rave about them. She especially likes the press for stuffed burgers. I believe she makes different ones 3 or 4 times a month !
customer_reviews.author: Judith M. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and well thought design! Light the grill and take a drink from the still! YEAH!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a winner! So excited I bought two! I hope it is not only veteran owned but made in America?! Yep, I’m one of those guys! Tough if you can’t take “Support of our troops” and Made in America!! Love it...
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea, frail execution.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Unfortunately it broke after the first use while washing it. A bit flimsy for a $40 piece of equipment, in my opinion. Also it's a nightmare to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hall

customer_reviews.title: ALL YOU NEED FOR A GREAT GRILLING EXPERIENCE.
customer_reviews.text: This is everything you need to make anything you want on the grill I used it for Beer Chicken 3 times screwers 2 times and Jalapeño poppers and i must say everyone was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great set for those who love to grill
customer_reviews.text: Great for those who love to grill and have a smoker. A versatile set and easy to clean. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: CDM22

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We smoked a pork roast and we were amazed in how juicy the roast remained after it was done and we were able to use the drippings for basting, we will try to do the beer chicken on a later time . It would make a wonderful gift for the person that is into smoking but it could stand to bigger for doing bigger roasts
customer_reviews.author: lisa witkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Used the BBQ aid for the first time last night to smoke some Mackerel, we court them at Fort Desoto Florida on Wednesday so they were fresh. They were wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Barrie S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy well made product
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall. Sturdy and thick metal. Well made at joints and pieces all pack together well for storing. Highly recommend for the price. Poppers were awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for novice to experienced grillers.
customer_reviews.text: I love this gadget. I can grill/oven roast jalapeno poppers, beer butt chicken, kabobs. Good sturdy stainless steel. I would highly recommend this gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Alexander

customer_reviews.title: I love this - I got it last Friday and used ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this - I got it last Friday and used it twice over the weekend. Very well made and works. I will use over the summer every time I grill. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Gary S

customer_reviews.title: Barbecue Aid
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son-in-law who grills a lot. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Norris

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional Smoking Utility
customer_reviews.text: love this item... I even cooked a small turkey on it and it kept it stable!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly N.

customer_reviews.title: Pan leaks
customer_reviews.text: I used the product in my oven as a beer can roaster/ I also used it for jalapeno poppers. The pan leaks, so drippings from the bacon wrapped poppers and grease from the chicken dripped into the pan and leaked out into my oven making a big mess. It sucked. Good design, but the fact that the pan leaks makes it unusable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W.

customer_reviews.title: I wish there was a bigger size
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much that I went ahead and bought another one very very well constructed very good stainless steel materials
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Pomales

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and they really like the product!!
customer_reviews.author: jn

customer_reviews.title: Really like the weight of it
customer_reviews.text: It's a Chritmas gift, so it hasn't been opened!! Really like the weight of it!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Partain

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my friend
customer_reviews.text: When my friend opened the package he called me to thank me for it. He also said he's putting me in his will. And then he asked why I didn't include a chicken!
customer_reviews.author: George Palmer

customer_reviews.title: for the bbq chef
customer_reviews.text: My son is a great cook and loves to barbeque for his family. Bought this as a gift and he said he LOVES IT!!
customer_reviews.author: claudiacsg

customer_reviews.title: Rate between 3-4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Works good but it’s terrible to clean, the pepper Rack is awesome but in hindsight I wished I’d bought just that I thought the whole set would make a nicer gift but regret buying the set
customer_reviews.author: Annet

customer_reviews.title: Pretty legit product.
customer_reviews.text: Love the versatility. Used it this weekend to steam some Portobello mushrooms in the smoker.
customer_reviews.author: JonJon

customer_reviews.title: A grilling must
customer_reviews.text: Just used it and I love it. Best way to cook jalapenos on the grill
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Getting my order correct with all the part ASAP
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t understand why my replacement order it says is gong to deliver in a month when it’s amazon prime I returned the other order that had a missing part already hopefully this is incorrect
customer_reviews.author: Matthew  Russell

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought for beer can chicken but thought might be useful for other endeavors. Really should be twice the length/width it is.

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing BBQ tool
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing BBQ tool. I got it as a gift from my daughter. Absolutely love it. Super versital and easy to clean. Absolutely love it!

customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, Good job works perfectly. I like the reservoir to put a nice humid flavor to my smoking pellets.

customer_reviews.text: I used it last night. it works great. Thanks a Bunch.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Too cold to use it yet, but seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... be typing that in a review) so I was happy to find this little setup with the other additional ...
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted to be able to make beer butt chicken (it seems wrong to be typing that in a review) so I was happy to find this little setup with the other additional options - if I'm going to store more stuff in my kitchen it better serve more than one purpose! With the exception of the jalapeno tray, I do wish everything was a little bit bigger - there aren't enough skewers and when we grill veggies we tend to do a lot more than what fits on that tray. For the price though it's totally worth it. I like the little bit of versatility, it is easy to use, clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: A. D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and really nice quality. First round of peppers were great!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: It was a Father’s Day gift for my husband and he likes it a lot.

customer_reviews.title: So Smart
customer_reviews.text: Such a smart idea! Am actually going to be using it for the first time this weekend & am excited! Showed everyone @ work & they say they want one, too!
customer_reviews.author: brenda omalley

customer_reviews.title: ... my husband and his new smoker/pellet grill and he loved everything that was included
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my husband and his new smoker/pellet grill and he loved everything that was included. Haven't had a chance to use any of it yet, but would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Abiz

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, well made. Minus 1 star for not grinding down (smoothing out) the sharp edges of the bore holes on the underside
customer_reviews.author: JSal

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Everyone raves about beer can chicken. I really don't know what the big deal is The chicken was not infused with flavor I did think the meat was very moist which sometimes roasted chicken is not. The BBQ aid was easy to use and the chicken remained in the upright position but all the juices did not land in the drip pan under it. They were all over my oven causing smoke in the house and a 4 hour oven cleaning . The piece cleans easily in the dish washer. I probably will use it for shiskabobs and maybe for the chicken on the outdoor grill
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas Gift for my son-in-law. He loves it. Nice smoke flavor and relatively easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L.

customer_reviews.title: For the griller
customer_reviews.text: does a great job for that special bird or small smoke pieces

customer_reviews.title: All in one!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend asked for this for his birthday. He uses it on his electric grill.

product_meta.title: BBQ-Aid - 5 in 1 Set - Ultimate 5in1 Grilling Accessory - Easily Make Great Tasting Barbecue - Beer Can Chicken Roaster, Smoker Box, Jalapeno Popper Rack, Flat Skewers Set & Dishwasher Safe
product_meta.description:
We are excited to launch our new 5 in One Multifunctional bbq tool. The modular design allows you to smoke, flavor and sear about anything you want. Like all BBQ-Aid products, we offer only the best quality and stand behind all of our products. 


USE AS: 
Beer Can Chicken Holder 
Jalapeno Grill Rack 
Smoker 
Skewer Rack 
Grilling Rack
feature_bullets: THE ULTIMATE GIFT FOR A GRILLER OR COOK - The sliding trey has two flavor compartments for beer / wine or your favorite marinade and also a compartment for smoker wood chips for that delicious smoky flavor and taste. You can also use as a jalapeno roaster rack, beer can chicken holder or skewers grilling rack

SWITCH BETWEEN / COMBINE 5 FUNCTIONS - Make incredible barbecue with: chicken beer can vertical roaster, jalapeno popper grilling rack / chili pepper, smoker box, flat skewer rack trey and an elevated grilling rack

EASY CLEANUP, DISHWASHER SAFE - Make Great BBQ and don't worry about having to clean a million different tools. We use high grade stainless steel, which is perfectly safe to put in your dishwasher or wash by hand. Our grilling accessories BBQ tool is detachable, so you only have to wash the parts you use. No more messy cleanups

SIMPLE BREAKDOWN AND STORE - Our barbeque accessories multi set is modular, so it can be taken apart and stored for quick and easy access. The next time you use it, just simply assemble the parts you need and get grilling right away!

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - Give our 5 in 1 BBQ combo / jalapeno grill rack a try and YOU decide on the quality and performance. If you’re not happy, simply contact us for our 100% satisfaction guarantee, which means you have NO RISK to try our jalapeno popper grill rack today! VETERAN OWNED BUSINESS
